meanings: beyond, over, the other[opposite] side(of a mountain)

vlive.korean: 무한한 공간 그 너머로! Go infinity, and beyond! 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 막내의 사생활 11 🦊
"무한한 공간 저 너머로!" "To infinity... and beyond!" 듣기 View video NU'EST : [NU'EST] 나 보고시퍼쬬?
[공원 너머 LA 도심에서는 누가 뭘 하고 있을까요?] [Who is doing what beyond the park?] View video Mnet : [ONE DREAM.TXT] Reality Ep.08 - Part.1
vlive.english: [Who is doing what beyond the park?]

vlive.korean: [수평선 너머 서서히 떠오르는 해] 저거 해야? [The sun is rising slowly] Is that the sun? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TALK X TODAY Epilogue
vlive.english: [The sun is rising slowly] Is that the sun?

vlive.korean: 그 너머로! - 이엔이 무슨 얘기 하고 싶었어? and beyond! - I.N, what were you talking about? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 막내의 사생활 11 🦊
vlive.english: and beyond! - I.N, what were you talking about?

examples.korean: The sound of their voices wafted across the lake. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들의 목소리가 호수 너머로 퍼져 갔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The sound of their voices wafted across the lake. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He lobbed the ball over the defender’s head. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그가 공을 수비수 머리 너머로 차 보냈다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He lobbed the ball over the defender’s head. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The path disappeared over the brow of the hill. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 오솔길은 산등성이 너머로 사라졌다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The path disappeared over the brow of the hill. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He succeeded in propelling the ball across the line. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그가 그 공을 라인 너머로 넘기는 데 성공했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He succeeded in propelling the ball across the line. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The goalkeeper just managed to tip the ball over the crossbar. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 골키퍼가 공을 살짝 건드려서 크로스바 너머로 넘기는 데 성공했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
